name: Burilka Pump
description:
Burilka Pump is a tabletop strategy game in which you have to carefully place oil pipes and various pumps to extract as much oil as possible. Meticulously plan your pipes placement and always have a backup plan in mind. Oil extraction business is harsh and resources are scarse.

Efficient extraction of oil increases your budget and provides you with more figures for your game board. Dig deeper and deeper to upgrade your production with selectable powerups. Stay focused and don't let that oil escape!

Controls

1. Hold RMB to move around

2. Use [Q] [W] [E] to select objects

3. Use mouse wheel to rotate objects

4. Use LMB to place selected object
